original_text: Also, the queen of Sheba travelled a long way to see King Solomon. She wanted to hear his wise words. When God judges everyone, she will stand up. She will speak against you who are alive today. She will show that you are bad people. She listened to King Solomon. But look! There is someone here now who is greater than Solomon was.
korean_text: 심판 때에 남방 여왕이 일어나 이 세대 사람을 정죄하리니 이는 그가 솔로몬의 지혜로운 말을 들으려고 땅 끝에서 왔음이거니와 솔로몬보다 더 큰 이가 여기 있으며

sentences.original_text: Also, the queen of Sheba travelled a long way
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 스바 여왕은 먼 길을 여행했습니다

sentences.original_text: She wanted to hear his wise words
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그의 지혜로운 말씀을 듣고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: She will show that you are bad people
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 당신들이 나쁜 사람들이라는 것을 보여줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who is greater than Solomon was
